Detailed Description

an interface for classes that support damping

See also:
CIrrOdeWorld

CIrrOdeBody This is just a little interface that provides access to the damping and enable / disable functions of ODE. There are only two subclasses: CIrrOdeWorld and CIrrOdeBody
